clinical_study.brief_title: The EMPOwER Study Evaluating Multiparameter Gene Testing as a Predictor of Short Term Endocrine Therapy Response in Hormone Receptor Positive Breast Cancers
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluating Multiparameter Gene Testing as a Predictor of Short Term Endocrine Therapy Response in Hormone Receptor Positive Breast Cancers: The EMPOwER Study

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluating Multiparameter Gene Testing as a Predictor of Short Term Endocrine Therapy Response in Hormone Receptor Positive Breast Cancers

detailed_description.textblock: The clinical trial will be a prospective, two strata, non-blinded, single institution, Health Canada approved, Window of Opportunity trial with 2 weeks of pre-surgical endocrine therapy using either anastrozole or tamoxifen. Tissue from the initial biopsy and from surgery will be sent for Ki67 analysis using the NanoString® Assay.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The clinical trial will be a prospective, two-strata, non-blinded, single institution Health Canada approved window of opportunity trial with 2 weeks of pre-surgical endocrine therapy using either anastrozole or tamoxifen.

primary_outcome.description: Introduction and validation of the use of NanoString® technology and a development of a custom gene codeset predictive of endocrine therapy response into the window setting as a more robust and reliable method of biomarker assessment as compared to Ki67.

secondary_outcome.description: Window of Opportunity clinical trial design as a means to evaluate the predictive value of potential biomarkers or biomarker-based tools.

arm_group.description: Anastrozole 1 mg (postmenopausal) or tamoxifen 20mg (premenopausal) are to be taken orally each evening and would be started exactly 2 weeks prior to their surgery.

intervention.description: Participants will take endocrine therapy for 2 weeks prior to surgery.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Any patient with histologically confirmed newly diagnosed operable ER+, Her2 negative invasive carcinoma on diagnostic core biopsy that has a radiographic size ≥ 1.5 cm
- Histology has to be ductal, lobular or mixed
- Surgery date planned in the next 2-6 weeks
- Negative pregnancy test if of child baring potential
- Post-menopausal status verified by FSH and Estradiol (with 6 months of amenorrhea)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous treatment with endocrine therapy, chemotherapy or chest wall radiation within last 6 months
- Known metastatic or recurrent breast cancer.
